snippet.title: Promise Mascot Agency - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
From the creators of Paradise Killer comes the world’s first (and best) Open World Mascot Management Crime Drama: this is Promise Mascot Agency.

Explore the cursed town of Kaso-Machi! Recruit and train mascot friends! Help out when jobs go wrong! Solve the mystery of your exile! Help Pinky work through her many anger issues! Turn Promise Mascot Agency into the best agency in Japan! Go go, Michi and Pinky! 

Promise Mascot Agency is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, Steam Deck and Windows in 2025. 

Wishlist:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585830/Promise_Mascot_Agency/
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/promise-mascot-agency-dd7a9c
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10008195
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p6gcj303k9b

Follow Kaizen Game Works on: 
Web: https://www.kaizengameworks.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KaizenGameWorks
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kaizengameworks/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kaizengameworks
